subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets staff is faltering, and has thrown a lot of innings. Los Angeles is sitting pretty with Clayton Kershaw and Zack Greinke. The two teams are likely to meet in the postseason.
snippet: The Mets staff is faltering, and has thrown a lot of innings. Los Angeles is sitting pretty with Clayton Kershaw and Zack Greinke. The two teams are likely to meet in the postseason.
